title.rendered: AFN SIDE STEPS & RAILS SUIT ISUZU D-MAX (2012 – 2016)

content.rendered:
AFN Side Steps & Rails to suit Isuzu D-MAX (2012-2016) are available now at Automax 4×4!

The AFN side steps & rails to suit your Isuzu D-MAX include;

  • Side Steps (steel tube design with checkered aluminum plate top – Hi-Lift Jack Points)
  • Side Rails (steel tube design – only compatible with AFN Side Steps)
  • Matte Black Powder Coated (Checkered Plates are Raw Aluminum)

Click here to check out our great range of products suited to your Isuzu D-MAX!

For more 4×4 inspiration follow us on Instagram and Facebook

excerpt.rendered: AFN side steps & rails to suit your Isuzu D-MAX (2012 – 2016 models) are currently available in store or online at Automax 4×4!
